H0.text: Who became the first king of the northern Israelite Kingdom of Israel after the revolt of the ten northern Israelite tribes against Rehoboam, who reigned for twenty-two years in the 900sBC. Jeroboam

H1.text: Who became the first king of the northern Israelite Kingdom of Israel after the revolt of the ten northern Israelite tribes against Rehoboam, who reigned for twenty-two years in the 900sBC. Abijah

H2.text: Who became the first king of the northern Israelite Kingdom of Israel after the revolt of the ten northern Israelite tribes against Rehoboam, who reigned for twenty-two years in the 900sBC. Baasha

H3.text: Who became the first king of the northern Israelite Kingdom of Israel after the revolt of the ten northern Israelite tribes against Rehoboam, who reigned for twenty-two years in the 900sBC. Nebat

A4.text: According to the book of 1 Kings, he reigned for 22 years and there was war continually between Rehoboam and Jeroboam.

A5.text: Abijah (also known as Abijam), Rehoboam's son, became king of Judah.
